<script type="text/javascript">
	
	/*
	 * Shuffle cars displayed on featured list (and trim if there are more than required)
	 */
	$(function () {
		var featuredMax = 5;		// how many cars should be displayed;
		var cars = $(".featured");
		//console.debug(cars);
		if (cars.length > featuredMax) {
			// remove random unnecesary cars
			var rem = cars.length - featuredMax;
			for (var i = 0; i < rem; i++) {
				cars = $('.featured');
				car = cars.get(Math.floor(Math.random()*cars.length))
				$(car).remove();
			}
		}
		
		
		// shuffle the rest:
		cars = $(".featured");
		var container = cars.parent();
		for (i = 0; i < cars.length; i++) {
			// get node:
			node = cars.eq(Math.floor(Math.random()*cars.length));

			// extract and append:
			node.remove().appendTo(container);
			
		}
		
		// reveal images
		cars.each(function(i, e){
			var c;
			(c = $("img", e)).attr('src', c.attr('rel'));
		});
		
		// show cars:
		$(".featured").show();
		
	
	});
</script>
